titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to restore the nonservice-connected burial benefit entitlement to survivors of certain wartime veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Provides a burial benefit entitlement for any veteran discharged from active duty for a service-connected disability. (Currently, there must be no next of kin claiming the body and insufficient familial resources for burial in order to receive such entitlement.)
